website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a collagen gel treatment for your entire face, provided your skin isn't extremely sensitive.
pros: In addition to 10 collagen infused masks, this kit includes 10 lip pads and 10 under eye pads for full face treatments
Smoother, brighter skin tone has been reported following use
cons: Can be messy, as the individual packages have excess liquid that's difficult to contain when opened
A few consumers report rashes after use

customer_reviews.title: I bought these masks because my friend recommended. Amazing items
customer_reviews.text: I bought these masks because my friend recommended. Amazing items! The facial mask feels so comfortable and stuck well on my face, I was wearing it watching TV, it stayed very well, this was a surprise; after 35 minutes my face skin felt soft, smooth and moist; the lip mask and eye pad have clear instructions and they were easy to use; I keep my eye pad and lip mask in the refrigerator and use them before I go to bed and after 30 minutes my lip felt a lot more soft and very hydrated! my eye bags were gone! I love these masks so much! Definitely must be buy again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Worst sheet mask I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much considering how affordable these were. But they smelled like straight alcohol and I couldn't leave it on my face for more than 5 minutes and when I took it off my face was bright red, and for the record I do not have sensitive skin. Still I thought maybe it was my skin ....so I gave them to a friend and she had the same adverse reaction. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Raeanne

customer_reviews.title: leaves a nice slight glitter on the skin and feels good if ...
customer_reviews.text: leaves a nice slight glitter on the skin and feels good if you keep it in the fridge and put it on to relax, but no actual moisterizing or smoothing effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift for my mother and she was excited to use this product since she has aged skin. She loved the results of the mask telling me it was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal 4 Fab Face
customer_reviews.text: Lightening, anti-aging, wrinkle smoother, moisturizing I could go on! I was charmed by my appearence after use!:) Even better? The 10+10+10 combo!
customer_reviews.author: yvonne marie green

customer_reviews.title: I love masks! This mask has a wonderful cooling feeling
customer_reviews.text: I love masks! This mask has a wonderful cooling feeling! The large face mask was a little tricky getting on I recommend putting it on and laying down! I tried to do stuff around the house with it on and it kept sliding..... love the lip mask and eye patches.... does leave a sticky feeling after but I used a little warm water and it went away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check it out
customer_reviews.text: I usually use this product if I need a face moisture booster or if I have pimples. I use this product before going to bed and leave it on for about 45 minutes. I then rub the residual product into my skin. By the time I wake up my face is moisturized and pimples gone. Amazing items. Softer lips with the lip mask and the under eye pick me up from time to time is great. A lot of product and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!  5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! 3rd time buying this, great product and amazingly low cost. Minimizes my poops, doesn’t cause my sensitive skin to breakout and feels and looks moisturizer. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: deal with queasiness or deal for soft skin??
customer_reviews.text: im giving this 4 stars bc of how soft my skin felt after using it but i hate the gooey feeling mask. whatever its made of has a smell that comes off of it that makes me queasy so i can't use any of them again. though it made my skin feel nice, i rather not keep them anymore since the smell makes me want to vomit.
customer_reviews.author: huh?

customer_reviews.title: Amazing products!
customer_reviews.text: These items are used daily in my Deluxe Spa facials that I perform in my massage therapy practice. Dehydration from the gel mask, eye and lip patches are absolutely amazing! My customers are always making recommendations and referrals for others to come see me for this service.
customer_reviews.author: Crow

customer_reviews.title: ... and smooth, I will keep using and order anagin,highly recommended. 😀
customer_reviews.text: I used two times for each mask ,I can tell my skin feel soft and smooth, I will keep using and order again,highly recommended.😀
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask, it makes my skin so smooth and soft, and I normally use twice a week, highly recommended, especially if you have dry skin!!! Must try it
customer_reviews.author: LI

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it for myself.
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan. I used the face mask and it left glitter everywhere and i HATE glitter. My skin felt slightly itchy after using, am seeing if i could return. My skin did look more radiant after though.
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works so good makes my skin glow and so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Meauhead

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use these frequently! Great price and great products. I can feel my skin tightening already
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mc

customer_reviews.title: Novelty Gold
customer_reviews.text: These are quite nice, I think they smell a little funny and wasn't expecting it to be a giant gold latex piece. An interesting cooling effect and skin is hydrated. The results however last about 24 hours, so be sure to use it the day of if you want to go out and feel a little extra. Kinda on the wall if I would order again; possibly if I were on the news or something. If you just wanna try something new and cool this might tickle your fancy
customer_reviews.author: Joey Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Soft face that last for days . This works wonders
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these masks are amazing. hydrating, calming, you can use them on the most sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: T Jayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm soooo excited and they are soooo fast, only 2 days... thanks sooo much.
customer_reviews.author: ana acosta

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliate before using these amazing masks!&
customer_reviews.text: MAKE SURE YOU EXFOLIATE before you use these!!! I usually do anyways with Dermalogica micro exfoliant but one day I forgot to with the face mask and I could just tell it was a waste and wasn't absorbing in my skin. I personally LOVE the texture, but my boyfriend hates it and won't even touch them now so if texture is a huge thing for you, just know it's a VERY soft malleable almost solid pudding feeling. I think it feels SO good and so smooth and I love it. My skin feels revived when I use these masks
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: ... the face one so far and face felt very nice after words
customer_reviews.text: Only used the face one so far and face felt very nice after words.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goldie
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time yesterday, not expecting to see immediate results. Completely satisfied with transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice but there is not gold in the mas
customer_reviews.text: Nice but there is not gold in the mas. The mas is gold color. Feels good after your put on for 30;
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Hydrated lips, love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I love these masks! I tend to get dry lips, no matter how much water or how much chapstick I use. These masks (face & lip) make my lips feel much more hydrated & fuller!! I do a weekly mask, doesn't make me break out or anything. No negatives to it. I'm sure if I used these mama more often than my once a week routine, my face would be brighter and plumper. I already see the difference in one use a week, I leave it on for 30-40 mins at a time.
customer_reviews.author: B.Sam

customer_reviews.title: Gold is great❤
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!!!!! I just cant believe how amazing my face looks after using this! I know it is temporary but i swear i cant stop looking at myself!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda L.

customer_reviews.title: Very wet.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. My aesthetician loves them, she uses them on her patients. They’re difficult to use if you want to walk around. The full face is way odd shaped for my face so I cut it right under the nose party. Very wet! Do not open on a surface you don’t want essence on.
customer_reviews.author: CJYi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and exactly what I ordered. GREAT deal for the price. 30 items total! I loved the results of the face mask and how refreshing it felt when taking it off- it was incredible! The under eye masks are perfect after a long day at work!! Love! Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great value with the multipack
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing and mild. I have sensitive skin and these do not irritate it. Relaxing to use with visible results after one use. Great value with the multipack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great mask for fine lines and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great mask for fine lines and wrinkles. Leaves the face coated and hydrated completely. There is actually enough solution in each packet to use 2 or 3 times. This is a home use product. If using in a salon or day spa then each mask definitely should be discorded after each use. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was given (sold for forty dollars)the full face “facial” after a vampire facial. I purchased this kit and was disappointed the eye patches fell off immediately, the full face and lip patch wasn’t that bad
customer_reviews.author: Monique D Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My esthetician used this and I had wonderful results. I use them in between facials to perk up my senior citizen skin.
customer_reviews.author: Skeezix

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time was even better. Deffinitly firms and tones the skin
customer_reviews.text: Tried 1st mask, saw immediate results. 2nd time was even better. Deffinitly firms and tones the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

product_meta.title: DreamMi (10 + 10 + 10 Comes in a Box) 10 Pieces Gold Bio-Collagen Face Facial Mask + 10 Pieces Gold Lip Mask + 10 Pairs Gold Eye Pad, Anti Wrinkle/Aging, Deep Moisture, By DreamMi
product_meta.description:
The best gift for your friends, your family, your love, and yourself!

DreamMi Cosmetics LLC is located in the United States. DreamMi is the company's Copyright Trademark. DreamMi products are distributed in the U.S by DreamMi Cosmetics LLC. DreamMi products are professional quality and are in packaging that clearly shows the DreamMi Copyright Trademark. Also, the product packaging clearly lists the descriptions of the ingredients, etc. So you know what you are using on your skin.

The DreamMi Gold Facial Mask will gradually dissolve under body temperature and permeate quickly into the skin. Increase fibre flexibility and strengthen the nutrient uptake. Enable the skin keep balance radiant and elastic; Stimulate cells regeneration and repair.

The DreamMi Gold Lip Mask formula contains hyaluronic acid, collagen, and glycerin; these ingredients will hydrate, reduce fine lines on and around your lips and boost plumpness. The DreamMi Gold Lip Mask treatment is designed to counteract the appearance of all types of wrinkles and fine lines in the mouth by returning youth-nurturing moisture and is great for firming the affected area caused by excessive dryness, thin skin or years of smoking.

DreamMi Gold Eye Pad speed-up cell and collagen rejuvenation. The eye pad will gradually dissolve under body temperature and permeate quickly into the skin. Increase fibre flexibility and strengthen the nutrient uptake. Enable the skin keep balance radiant and elastic. Stimulate cells regeneration and repair. Moisturizing and firming eye skin, relieve fatigue eyes, anti dark circles, anti eye bags, anti fine lines, anti wrinkle and anti aging.

The DreamMi gentle facial mask, eye pad and lip mask are non-irritating and easy to use. Recommended for all skin types and especially to fatigued and dehydrated skin.

Also, the product packaging clearly lists the descriptions of the ingredients, etc. So you know what you are using on your skin

The DreamMi lip mask formula contains hyaluronic acid, collagen, and glycerin; these ingredients will hydrate, reduce fine lines on and around your lips and boost plumpness. The DreamMi lip mask treatment is designed to counteract the appearance of all types of wrinkles and fine lines in the mouth by returning youth-nurturing moisture and is great for firming the affected area caused by excessive dryness, thin skin or years of smoking.

People who lack of sleep, improper diet, chain smokers; people whose long-term use of eye makeup or improper use of cosmetics or when female menstrual period, long-term reading & writing, long-term use of the computer and watching TV, driving a long time, etc, these situations could be easily lead to eye fatigue. The DreamMi eye pad will gradually dissolve under body temperature and permeate quickly into the skin. Increase fibre flexibility and strengthen the nutrient uptake. Moisturizing and firming eye skin, relieve fatigue eyes, anti dark circles, anti eye bags, anti fine lines, anti wrinkle and anti aging.
